datarule="${DATA_RULE}" <#if MAX_LENGTH?? >maxlength="${MAX_LENGTH}" <#if CONTROL_LABEL?? >label_value="${CONTROL_LABEL}" <#if COMP_PLACEHOLDER?? >placeholder="${COMP_PLACEHOLDER}" <#if COMP_COL_NUM?? >comp_col_num="${COMP_COL_NUM}" <#if LABEL_COL_NUM?? >label_col_num="${LABEL_COL_NUM}" <#if CONTROL_STYLE?? >style="${CONTROL_STYLE}" <#if CONTROL_ATTACH?? >attach_props="${CONTROL_ATTACH}" <#if COMP_MAX_VALUE?? >max="${COMP_MAX_VALUE}" <#if COMP_MIN_VALUE?? >min="${COMP_MIN_VALUE}" > <#if PLAT_DESIGNMODE?? >
PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_FINCODE:
<plattag:input name="DEVMAN_EMAIL" allowblank="false" auth_type="write" 
      value="${devMan.DEVMAN_EMAIL}" 
      datarule="required;email;remote[common/baseController.do?checkUnique&VALID_TABLENAME=PLAT_SYSTEM_DEVMAN&VALID_FIELDLABLE=邮箱地址&VALID_FIELDNAME=DEVMAN_EMAIL&RECORD_ID=${devMan.DEVMAN_ID}]"  
      maxlength="30"
      label_value="邮箱地址"
      placeholder="请输入邮箱地址"
      comp_col_num="4"
      label_col_num="2"
      
      
      
      
   >
   </plattag:input>

PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_TPLCODE:
<#if PLAT_DESIGNMODE?? >
datarule="${DATA_RULE}" <#if MAX_LENGTH?? >maxlength="${MAX_LENGTH}" <#if CONTROL_LABEL?? >label_value="${CONTROL_LABEL}" <#if COMP_PLACEHOLDER?? >placeholder="${COMP_PLACEHOLDER}" <#if COMP_COL_NUM?? >comp_col_num="${COMP_COL_NUM}" <#if LABEL_COL_NUM?? >label_col_num="${LABEL_COL_NUM}" <#if CONTROL_STYLE?? >style="${CONTROL_STYLE}" <#if CONTROL_ATTACH?? >attach_props="${CONTROL_ATTACH}" <#if COMP_MAX_VALUE?? >max="${COMP_MAX_VALUE}" <#if COMP_MIN_VALUE?? >min="${COMP_MIN_VALUE}" > <#if PLAT_DESIGNMODE?? >
PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_FINCODE:
<plattag:input name="DEVMAN_NAME" allowblank="false" auth_type="write" 
      value="${devMan.DEVMAN_NAME}" 
      datarule="required;"  
      maxlength="14"
      label_value="姓名"
      placeholder="请输入姓名"
      comp_col_num="4"
      label_col_num="2"
      
      
      
      
   >
   </plattag:input>
